sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This document lists known limitations by version number. It includes user and developer notes.

sect2.para: Its possible to get ConcurrentModificationsException editing options on a running crawl.

sect3.title: Workaround
sect3.para: Pause the crawl when making changes to crawl options.
